name: Resident Evil Revelations 2 / Biohazard Revelations 2
description: Resident Evil Revelations 2 is the sequel to Resident Evil Revelations, a classic survival horror game, set up in a movie-like-style and delivered in challenging and thrilling episodes
content:
files:
- codecs: https://lutris.net/files/tools/windowsmedia-kb942423-x86-intl.exe
game:
  appid: 287290
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: corefonts
    description: Corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2008
    description: vcrun
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: wmp10
    description: Installing Windows Media Player 10
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    description: Installing DirectX components
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    description: Installing DirectX components
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: xact_jun2010
    description: Installing Xact
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    args: /q
    description: Installing video codecs
    executable: codecs
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  pulse_latency: true
  reset_pulse: true
winesteam:
  overrides:
    xaudio2_6: native
    xaudio2_7: native
